text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco GDP contracted 32.9% in 2Q2020.  Over 153,000 Americans have died of COVID-19 in five months. So *45 is desperate to distract us with dramatic idiocy. Don’t let him move your attention from his failures with more puerile stunts. #DumpTrump11320 #AmericaforBiden #GOTV #VBMYES https://t.co/0uCeB8XA7F

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
